name: Color Magnet 3D
description:
Gameplay is simple!

- Drag your magnet with one finger
- Collect objects to pass the levels.
- Avoid red spikes

Enjoy!

Colors! You need colors to survive. Pull and devour them while avoiding dangerous spikes! As you consume colors, you’ll need more and more. Keep an eye out on the counter, beat levels and break the highest score of The-Color-Eating-Giant-Magnet!

Colorful gameplay
Easy controls
Progressive levels
Endless challenges

Tap into the world of chasing colors now!
